acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Ramdhan Namusudra is produced from jail hazot. Today is the date fixed for delivery of judgment. Judgment is written on separate sheets and delivered in open court and enclosed with the case record. For the reasons recorded in the judgment, I have arrived at the finding that prosecution has succeeded to bring home the change U/S 6 of the POCSO Act, 2012 and Section 302 of IPC against accused Ramdhan Namusudra and accordingly he is convicted under the sections. The accused person is heard on the matter of sentence and same is recorded in a separate sheet in the form of question and answer and shall form a part of the record. Accordingly, accused Ramdhan Namasudra is sentenced for his offence U/S 302 IPC and U/S 6 of the POCSO Act. He is sentenced to undergo Rigorous for life and also to pay fine of Rs. 10,000/- in default R.I. for another 6 (Six) months under section 302 of IPC. The accused is also sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for life and also to pay fine of Rs. 10,000/- in default R.I. for another 6 (Six) months under Section 6 of the POCSO Act. Both the sentences will be concurrently. Seized materials shall be destroyed in due course of law. The accused person is already in custody. Issue Imprisonment Warrant against the accused to serve the sentence passed against him. Free copy of judgment be furnished to the convict immediately.Copy of the judgment be sent to learned District Magistrate of Nagaon u/s 365 Cr.P.C.The DLSA, Nagaon will make necessary enquiry to provide compensation to the next of the kins of deceased &amp#039X&amp#039 under the victim compensation scheme as envisage u/s 357-A of Cr.P.C. Copy of the judgment be sent to DSLA, Nagaon, accordingly. This sessions case is accordingly disposed of.

Copy of the judgment be sent to DSLA, Nagaon, accordingly. This sessions case is accordingly disposed of.

The accused is also sentenced to undergo Rigorous Imprisonment for life and also to pay fine of Rs. 10,000/- in default R.I. for another 6 (Six) months under Section 6 of the POCSO Act. Both the sentences will be concurrently. Seized materials shall be destroyed in due course of law. The accused person is already in custody. Issue Imprisonment Warrant against the accused to serve the sentence passed against him. Free copy of judgment be furnished to the convict immediately.Copy of the judgment be sent to learned District Magistrate of Nagaon u/s 365 Cr.P.C.The DLSA, Nagaon will make necessary enquiry to provide compensation to the next of the kins of deceased &amp#039X&amp#039 under the victim compensation scheme as envisage u/s 357-A of Cr.P.C. Copy of the judgment be sent to DSLA, Nagaon, accordingly. This sessions case is accordingly disposed of.
